short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension saves tab titles/URLs and auto-closes tabs when count exceeds 30, keeping your browser organized and efficient.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Manager Pro is your ultimate solution for browser tab management. This extension saves the titles and URLs of your tabs into a html file at the time of closing. When your tab count exceeds 30, it automatically closes the oldest tabs to keep your workspace tidy and manageable. Whether youâ€™re a power user juggling numerous tabs or someone looking to streamline their browsing experience, Tab Manager Pro ensures you stay organized and focused with minimal effort.

Automatic Tab Closure: Closes tabs automatically when the count exceeds 30, helping to prevent browser clutter.
Save & Review: Download html file with tab titles and URLs at the time of closure for future reference or re-opening.
Effortless Management: Simplifies tab management and improves browser performance with minimal user intervention.
Experience a cleaner, more organized browsing experience with Tab Manager Pro.
